projects.title: OCR Document Automation
projects.publicSummary: Production OCR + mapping pipeline that converts scanned documents into structured outputs.

proof.outcome: 100% field-mapping accuracy on the target document set.
proof.constraints: Noisy scans and layout variance; strict correctness requirements.
proof.approach: OCR extraction plus context-aware mapping with deterministic fallbacks where needed.
proof.reliability: Multi-layer validation, confidence scoring, audit logs, and fallbacks.

projects.title: RAG Assistant
projects.publicSummary: Retrieval system that grounds answers in indexed content with a repeatable pipeline.

proof.outcome: Working end-to-end pipeline with persistent indexing and a usable demo.
proof.constraints: Retrieval quality and safety when sources are weak; repeatability.
proof.approach: Chunking/embedding → FAISS index → top-k retrieval → constrained generation.
proof.reliability: Deterministic indexing, guardrails, and no-answer behavior when retrieval is insufficient.
